title: Bloomberg Markets: South American Tech Comes to Silicon Valley
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: South American Tech Comes to Silicon Valley
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Alex Robbio President & Co-Founder Belatrix Software Discussing opening U.S. headquarters in Redwood City, C.A., aiming to compete directly with larger high-tech companies for the best talent.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
